query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.operatetype in (46, 61)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid, est.senddeptid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@' and est.operatetype in (46, 61)

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and est.operatetype in(46,61) and est.completeflag=2 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid, est.senddeptid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and est.operatetype in(46,61) and est.completeflag=2 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@' and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@'

select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid, est.senddeptid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@' and est.operatetype in (46, 61) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from EST_COMMONFAULT est1 where est1.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est1.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est1.status=1 and est1.operatetype in(46,61) and est1.completeflag=2 and (est1.maindelayflag='' or est1.maindelayflag is null) and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est1.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est1.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est1.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est1.TODEPTID='@s5@')

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.operatetype in (46, 61) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid, est.senddeptid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@' and est.operatetype in (46, 61) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and est.operatetype in (46, 61) and est.completeflag=2 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid, est.senddeptid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and est.operatetype in (46, 61) and est.completeflag=2 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@' and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid, est.senddeptid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag='' or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@' and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est.operatetype in (46, 61) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from EST_COMMONFAULT est1 where est1.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est1.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est1.status=1 and (est1.maindelayflag='' or est1.maindelayflag is null) and est1.operatetype in(46,61) and est1.completeflag=2 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est1.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est1.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est1.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est1.TODEPTID='@s5@' and LENGTH(est1.operateroleid)=32)
